system.description: You confer on the subject the ability to see all things as they actually are. The subject sees through normal and magical darkness, notices secret doors, sees the exact locations of creatures or objects under blur or displacement, sees invisible creatures or objects, sees through illusions, and sees the true form of polymorphed, changed, or transmuted things. The range of true seeing is 120 feet. True seeing does not penetrate solid objects. It does not reveal creatures on other planes, nor does it reveal the alignment of creatures. True seeing can be made permanent with a permanency spell.

components.materialDescription: An ointment for the eyes that costs 250 gp and is made from mushroom powder, saffron, and fat. Focus: a small amount of mushroom powder.
